name: Death's Intern
description:
Made for Retro Game Jam(but game is not really retro)

Desc:

Originally made for SNES, In "Death's Intern"

You play as the Menacing "Grim Reaper" but... you're an intern in Death's Company.

Happy go lucky "Death" has given you another overtime and sent you straight to business, soul reaping.  But wait what's this amazing helmet?

Controls:

"WASD" or "arrow keys" to move.

"Q" and "E"  to drink from your helmet, Q for a speed boost with a damage side effect E for a health boosts with a speed side effect. Each has a duration and cooldown.

Left-Click to attack and Shift to dodge(small I-frame).

Developer Notes: 

To be honest this Jam was just an excuse to get 3" soon to be graduates" off their lazy asses and to do something with their lives.

Our wish is to continue development to develop our skills(wow, very original).

We hope to turn this game into a full fledge game and any comments is appreciated.

Credits: 

NotCantSing - Programmer, Artist

ItsaCabbage - Main Artist

Music Used:

Daybreak by Kevin MacLeod
